name: T - Sarah Natalia
_source: speak;Sarah; You're one of the light mages I saw at that village last week.
speak;Natalia; And you were the merc leader that helped us with our food situation.{w} Funny to see each other like this.
speak;Sarah; What happened?{w} What path could possibly have led you here?
speak;Natalia; The day after you left, more bandits came back and destroyed my home.{w} My sisters were killed, and I was spared only to be kidnapped.
speak;Sarah; You don't have to worry about fighitng with them anymore.{w} Come with us and you'll never fight for the wrong people again.
speak;Natalia; You have my thanks, mercenary{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I shall repay you for this.
